entry.title: Current Conditions: 15.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 12:30 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 13.9°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain or drizzle beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 20 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending before morning then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
